message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm willing to part with it for $950,000. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $700,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider coming down to $900,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $850,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
